content:
Farming isn't really that hard mah~
If you put your heart into it, 
we can all grow a wonderful harvest full of joy!
info: 第三天-云果-回家_云果线1

content:
Really mah~?
This is wonderful mah~!
Then I won't hold back~!
info: 第三天-云果-回家_云果线1
第三天-云果-回家_云果线1

content:
Haven't finished picking the fruits mah~?
Well, take your time and enjoy the harvest joy,
I'll wait right here until you're done.
info: 第三天-云果-回家_云果线1

content:
Y-you make such a good point!
Why don't you stay here with us
and farm together? We'll take good care of you mah~!
info: 第三天-云果-回家_云果线1

content:
O-oh wise Skies Above!
You can have the fruits, but I'm taking Yunguo home!
Bye-bye mah~!
info: 第三天-云果-回家_云果线1

content: (test) L-let's share all the fruit we picked with the Residents mah~!
info: 第三天-云果-回家_云果线1

content:
Umm... I need to consult The Skies Above,
The Skies Above says I must return home with {me}!
And we need to leave right now!
info: 第三天-云果-回家_云果线1
